# Welcome to Eduverse Dashboard

> AI-powered educational platform with autonomous tutoring agents, RAG-powered content retrieval, and adaptive learning

[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-3.11+-blue.svg)](https://www.python.org/)
[![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-5.8+-blue.svg)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
[![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-18.3+-61dafb.svg)](https://reactjs.org/)

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/eduverse-dashboard.git
cd eduverse-dashboard

# Install dependencies
npm install
cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt

# Start development servers
npm run dev  # Frontend
python -m app.main  # Backend
```

See [Quick Start Guide](./docs/QUICK_START.md) for detailed setup instructions.

## ğŸ—ï¸ Tech Stack

**Frontend**: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS  
**Backend**: FastAPI, Python 3.11+  
**AI/ML**: Google Cloud Vertex AI, Gemini, RAG  
**Database**: Supabase (PostgreSQL)  
**Vector DB**: Pinecone / Vertex AI Vector Search
